item.title: BL-84/US-30 East Approaching BL-84/US-30 Split
item.description: BL-84/US-30 East approaching BL-84/US-30 Split in Bliss. Turn right to continue east on US-30; straight for BL-84/To US-26/To I-84.

item.title: BL-84/US-30 East - Bliss
item.description: BL-84/US-30 East in Bliss.

item.title: Pioneer Road at I-84/US-30/BL-84
item.description: Pioneer Road at I-84/US-30/BL-84 (Exit 137). Turn left for I-84 East to Wendell and Twin Falls; continue straight for US-30/BL-84 to Bliss.

item.title: End Pioneer Road (Old US-30) at I-84
item.description: End Pioneer Road (Old US-30) at I-84 onramp. Turn right for I-84/US-26/US-30 West to Boise; turn left for I-84/US-26(East) to Twin Falls and US-30 East to Bliss.

item.title: I-84 East at BL-84/US-26 Jct. - Bliss
item.description: I-84 East at US-26 Jct. in Bliss. Turn right for BL-84/To US-30 to Hagerman and Bliss City Center. Turn left for US-26 East to Gooding and Shoshone.

item.title: I-84 - Exit 137 Offramp at Pioneer Road
item.description: I-84 - Exit 137 Offramp at Pioneer Road. Merge left for Pioneer Road. Continue straight for US-30 to Bliss and Buhl.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137 - BL-84/US-30/Bliss/Buhl. US-30 leaves I-84 here, and rejoins I-84 in Heyburn. This is the western end of the Thousands Springs Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137 - BL-84/US-30/Bliss/Buhl. US-30 leaves I-84 here, and rejoins I-84 in Heyburn.

item.title: US-30 West At I-84 West Exit 137
item.description: US-30 West at I-84 west Exit 137 onramp.

item.title: US-30 West at BL-84
item.description: US-30 west at BL-84. Turn left for US-30 to Boise and Bliss. Turn right for US-26 and I-84 to Gooding.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching BL-84
item.description: US-30 west approaching BL-84/To US-26/To I-84 in Bliss.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 137
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 137, Bliss/Pioneer Road.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 141, BL-84/US-26/To US-30/Bliss/Hagerman.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 141, BL-84/US-26/To US-30/Bliss/Hagerman, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141 - Hagerman Fossil Beds NM
item.description: For Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument, use Exit 141 on I-84 west.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 141
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 141, US-26/US-30 junction

item.title: I-84 East Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137, BL-84/US-30. US-30 is the 1000 Springs Scenic Byway

item.title: US-30 West/BL-84 - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30/BL-84 West - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway in Bliss.

item.title: US-30/BL-84 West - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: Thousand Springs Scenic Byway and BL-84/US-30 Shields in Bliss

item.title: BL-84/US-30 East at US-30 East
item.description: BL-84/US-30 east at US-30 east to Hagerman and Buhl. BL-84 meets I-84 and US-26 about 1/4 mile to the east.

item.title: US-30 East - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30/BL-84 East - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
